## ICardDimensions interface

Describes the dimensions of a rectangular card in centimeters.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICardDimensions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [height](./bge-core.icarddimensions.height.md) |  | number | Height of the card in centimeters. |
|  [thickness](./bge-core.icarddimensions.thickness.md) |  | number | Thickness of the card in centimeters. |
|  [width](./bge-core.icarddimensions.width.md) |  | number | Width of the card in centimeters. |
